Hi Blacktroy, thank you for this one, but alas, I really can't finf the serial or keygen - can you help me please? I suppose it will be only a small stupid mistake on my part...

Anyone else, please?
I'm dying to try this prog, so if someone can help me out with crack, serial and/or activation... welcome!!

nice_guy_eddie, unpack the rar file in the new folder & it will give you the installer and a folder named crack. inside the crack folder is the application file "AVS Video Converter". copy this file to the installed folder of AVS VC7 (path: c:/program files/AVS4YOU/AVS Video Converter) by paste & replace the existing file. Then open & enjoy. I just installed & used, everything is working 100%. BLACKTROY, you're the man. thanks.

For first timers,if you are running an Anti Virus with "Sonar Detection" such as "Norton AV" You have to disable "sonar Detection" as it will sometimes detect the Crack as a threat and it will remove the crack leaving you with an empty folder.Set your AV to exclude scanning program folder and subfolder containing app

Thanks a Lot, BLACKTROY
